rows.label: bf11330100_0010
rows.name: Thank you all for joining me here.

rows.label: bf11330100_0020
rows.name:
I'm afraid I have important news that I 
need to impart to Adel.

rows.label: bf11330100_0060
rows.name:
I've been gathering an army in Invidia.
People who lost homes, families.

rows.label: bf11330100_0070
rows.name: People who'll make a stand against Metsu.

rows.label: bf11330100_0080
rows.name:
Well, according to intelligence we received,
they have departed from Invidia.

rows.label: bf11330100_0090
rows.name:
What? Why?
Metsu's whereabouts are still unclear.

rows.label: bf11330100_0100
rows.name: It seems Invidia has conscripted them all.

rows.label: bf11330100_0110
rows.name:
It's a special regiment of the
Invidian self-defense forces.

rows.label: bf11330100_0120
rows.name:
I thought I'd sorted this all out with the
Invidian king.

rows.label: bf11330100_0130
rows.name:
At His Majesty's behest, we have ascertained
the position of the moving troops.

rows.label: bf11330100_0140
rows.name: They are heading to Iira as we speak

rows.label: bf11330100_0150
rows.name:
We have established communications,
so you can send word at any time.

rows.label: bf11330100_0170
rows.name:
When they get to Iira..
Tell them to go to Aletta... Gah...
